alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Southern Perkins; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 25 at 1:43PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...The Northern Meade County Plains, the Custer County Plains, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills, the Southern Meade County Plains and Southern Perkins County. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Southern Perkins; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills
